put something at something.translation[0: to calculate or guess an amount, number, age etc, without being very exact
Her fortune was put at £5.5 million.
put something at something.translation[1: to calculate and state an amount, without trying to be very exact
Official estimates put the storm damage at over $10 million.
Net assets are put at about £225 million.
Analysts put the break-up value of the company at £3 billion more than its current £6.5 billion capitalization.
